name: getMandate
description:
Retrieve all details for a direct debit mandate.
The permision needed to access this endpoint is PERM_BUSINESS_GET_MANDATE

mandateUuid.description: The uuid of the mandate to retrieve.

$ul: **alias**: The name of the alias
**currency**: The currency.
**code**: The three letter code for the currency - either `EUR` or `GBP`.
**description**: The name of the currency
**dateCancelled**: Date the direct debit was canceled. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**dateCompleted**: Date the direct debit was completed. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**dateCreated**: Date the direct debit was created. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**fireRejectionReason**: Rejection reason if transaction is rejected
**lastUpdated**: Date the direct debit was last updated. Milliseconds since the epoch (1970).
**latestDirectDebitAmount**: The value of largest direct debit collected
**latestDirectDebitDate**: The date of latest direct debit collected
**mandateReference**: the reference of the mandate
**mandateUuid**: The UUID for the mandate
**numberOfDirectDebitCollected**: The number of direct debits collected
**originatorAlias**: The name of the alias
**originatorLogoUrlLarge**: Logo url from party who sets up the direct debit.
**originatorLogoUrlSmall**: Logo url from party who sets up the direct debit.
**originatorName**: The creator of the party who sets up the direct debit.
**originatorReference**: Set by party who sets up the direct debit.
**schemeCancelReason**: Reason for cancelation
**schemeCancelReasonCode**: The cancelation code returned by the bank indicating an issue with the direct debit. Each ARRUD code represents a rejection reason.
**status**: The status of the mandate.
**targetIcan**: Identifier for the fire.com account (assigned by fire.com)
**valueOfDirectDebitCollected**: The value of direct debits collected
